resource_data:
"<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">
  <identifier>
    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/78075</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>78075</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>SDT</catalog>
            <entry>40cb1e14-d284-45ad-2320-12a9b94680c1#1#5</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="hu">Ötvöstechnikák áttekintése</string>
            <string language="en">summary of goldsmith techniques</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Zusammenfassung der Goldschmiedtechniken</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">sommaire des techniques d'orfèvre</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">sumário de técnicas do goldsmith</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">sommario delle tecniche dell'orafo</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">περίληψη των τεχνικών χρυσοχόων</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">resumen de las técnicas del orfebre</string>
          </title>
          <language>hu</language>
          <description>
            <string language="hu">Ötvöstechnikák áttekintése</string>
            <string language="en">summary of goldsmith techniques</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="hu">ötvösség,  nemesfém,  arany,  ezüst,  forrasztás,  drágakő,  zománc,  görögök,  filigrán,  granuláció,  rómaiak,  tausírozás,  trébelés,  poncolás,  népvándorlás kor,  limoges-i zománc,  rekeszzománc,  9. évfolyam,  sodronyzománc,  ronde-bosse-zománc,  nielló,  céh,  aranyműves,  ezüstműves,  </string>
            <string language="en">chasing, precious metal, golden, silver, soldering, precious stone, enamel, greeks, filigran, granultaion, romans, plaiting matel-work, embossing, ornamentation of metal work with sharp ended steel rod, migration era, limoges lacquer, aperture lacquer, 9th class, wire lacquer, ronde-bosse lacquer, niello, guild, goldsmith, silversmith,</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Zusammenfassung der Goldschmiedtechniken</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">sommaire des techniques d'orfèvre</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">sumário de técnicas do goldsmith</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">sommario delle tecniche dell'orafo</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">περίληψη των τεχνικών χρυσοχόων</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">resumen de las técnicas del orfebre</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">jagend, matel-arbeiten das kostbare Metall, golden, 
Silber, weichlötend, kostbarer Stein, Emaille, Grieche, filigran, 
granultaion, romans, flechtend und prägen, Verzierung der 
Metallarbeit mit scharfer beendeter Stahlstange, Migration Ära, 
Limoges Lack, Blendenöffnung Lack, 9. Kategorie, Leitung Lack, 
ronde-bosse Lack, niello, Zünft, Goldschmied, Silberschmied,</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">chassant, le métal précieux, d'or, argent, soudant, 
pierre précieuse, émail, Grecs, filigran, granultaion, romans, 
tressant matel-travaillent, gravant en refief, ornement de métal ouvré
avec la tige en acier terminée pointue, ère de transfert, laque de 
Limoges, laque d'ouverture, la 9ème classe, laque de fil, laque de 
ronde-bosse, niello, guilde, orfèvre, orfèvre,</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">perseguindo, o metal precioso, dourado, prata, soldando, 
pedra preciosa, esmalte, gregos, filigran, granultaion, romans, 
plaiting matel-trabalha, gravando, ornamentation do trabalho com a 
haste de aço terminada afiada, era do metal da migração, laca de 
limoges, laca da abertura, 9a classe, laca do fio, laca do 
ronde-bosse, niello, guild, goldsmith, silversmith,</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">inseguendo, il metallo prezioso, dorato, argento, 
saldando, pietra preziosa, lo smalto, i Greci, il filigran, il 
granultaion, romans, intrecciando matel-funziona, imprimendo, 
ornamentation del lavoro con l'asta d'acciaio concluso tagliente, 
l'era di espansione, la lacca de Limoges, la lacca dell'apertura, il 
nono codice categoria, la lacca del legare, la lacca del ronde-bosse, 
il niello, la cooperativa, l'orafo, silversmith del metallo,</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">χαράζοντας, το πολύτιμο μέταλλο, χρυσό, ασήμι, συγκόλληση,
πολύτιμος λίθος, σμάλτο, Έλληνες, filigran, granultaion, 
Ρωμαίοι, ματελ-εργασία πλεξίματος, αποτύπωση σε ανάγλυφο, 
διακόσμηση της εργασίας μετάλλων με την αιχμηρή τελειωμένη ράβδο
χάλυβα, εποχή μετανάστευσης, λάκκα του Λιμόζ, λάκκα ανοιγμάτων,
9η κλάση, λάκκα καλωδίων, ronde-bosse λουστράρει με λάκκα, 
niello, συντεχνία, χρυσοχόος, αργυροχόος,</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">persiguiendo, el metal precioso, de oro, plata, 
soldando, piedra preciosa, esmalte, Griegos, filigran, granultaion, 
romans, trenzando matel-trabaja, grabando, ornamentation del trabajo 
con la barra de acero terminada sostenida, era de la migración, laca 
de Limoges, laca de la abertura, 9na clase, laca del alambre, laca del
ronde-bosse, niello, gremio, orfebre, platero del metal,</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
        <educational>
          <typicalAgeRange>
            <string language="x-T-LRE">13-15</string>
          </typicalAgeRange>
          <learningResourceType>
            <source>LRE.learningResourceTypeValues</source>
            <value>presentation</value>
          </learningResourceType>
        </educational>
        <rights>
          <cost>
            <source>costValues</source>
            <value>no</value>
          </cost>
          <copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
            <source>copyrightAndOtherRestrictionsValues</source>
            <value>yes</value>
          </copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
          <description>
            <string language="hu">A tartalom kizárólag kizárólag az oktatás illetve tudományos kutatás céljára használható szigorúan non-profit jelleggel.</string>
            <string language="en">The content may be used for the sole purpose of illustration for teaching or scientific research and only for a strictly non-commercial purpose.</string>
          </description>
        </rights>
        <lifeCycle>
          <contribute>
            <role>
              <source>roleValues</source>
              <value>publisher</value>
            </role>
            <entity>begin:vcard 
version:3.0
n:;
fn:

end:vcard</entity>
          </contribute>
        </lifeCycle>
        <classification>
          <purpose>
            <source>purposeValues</source>
            <value>discipline</value>
          </purpose>
          <taxonPath>
            <source>
              <string language="x-none">LRE-0001</string>
            </source>
            <taxon>
              <id>591</id>
            </taxon>
          </taxonPath>
        </classification>
        <metaMetadata>
          <contribute>
            <role>
              <source>LRE.roleMetaValues</source>
              <value>provider</value>
            </role>
            <entity>begin:vcard
        org:Sulinet
        version:3.0
        end:vcard</entity>
          </contribute>
        </metaMetadata>
      </lom>
    </metadata>
  </description>

  </manifestation>
</expression>
"
